EmailTemplate.name: Pilot Webinars.APEX Tips and Tricks REMINDER
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: Honeywell Primus Apex Tips & Tricks Pilot Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Honeywell Primus Apex® Tips & Tricks Pilot Webinar Honeywell Primus Apex® Tips & Tricks Pilot Webinar You're invited to participate in this Honeywell Aerospace Pilot Training webinar, hosted by Stephen Hammack - Honeywell Program Pilot for Apex Platforms. The webinar agenda topics will include:
- Some of the unique features of SmartViewTM Synthetic Vision System and ways to use it - A review of features useful for VFR Operations - Discussion of some less used and less known features, and useful tips and tricks for using Apex - Available Resources (apps, free training and other resources)
Date: Tuesday, November 11, 2014 Time: 08:00 - 09:00 AM PST (GMT-8) Duration: 60 minutes Click here <http://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/Honeywell APEX Tips Tricks Pilot Webinar.ics> to download an Outlook invite with the link and phone number for the webinar. Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2014 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
